html:
Digital Marketing Strategy

Effective planning and strategies are key to success in marketing. In this module, you will explore the role of digital technology in business and how to develop and implement impactful digital marketing strategies to achieve the ambition and growth of organisations.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate knowledge and critical understanding of strategic digital marketing.

+  Develop a practical digital planning framework to ensures your strategy lays the foundation for powerful strategy development.

+  Evaluate a grounded strategy which focuses on targeting decisions, drives proposition development and supports CX across each Customer Journey touchpoint

+  Analyse efficient and effective data, channel and creative strategies to support and evaluate the delivery of your digital strategic plan.

Module Content:
